description: Views all executions for a specific association ID.

parameters.name: AssociationId
parameters.description: The association ID for which you want to view execution history details.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters for the request. You can specify the following filters and values. ExecutionId (EQUAL) Status (EQUAL) CreatedTime (EQUAL, GREATER_THAN, LESS_THAN) (dict) --- Filters used in the request. The key value used in the request. The value specified for the key. The filter type specified in the request.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key value used in the request.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value specified for the key.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The filter type specified in the request.

nested_items.name: AssociationExecutions
nested_items.description: A list of the executions for the specified association ID.

nested_items.name: ExecutionId
nested_items.description: The execution ID for the association.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the association execution.

nested_items.name: DetailedStatus
nested_items.description: Detailed status information about the execution.

nested_items.name: LastExecutionDate
nested_items.description: The date of the last execution.

nested_items.name: ResourceCountByStatus
nested_items.description: An aggregate status of the resources in the execution based on the status type.

nested_items.name: AlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm you want to apply to an automation or command.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: TriggeredAlarms
nested_items.description: The CloudWatch alarms that were invoked by the association.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
